snippet: The Orange County Sheriff’s Office said charges would be brought against members of the school band involved in the death of Robert Champion.
abstract: Orange County, Fla, Sheriff’s Office says charges will be brought against members of the Florida A&M University marching band involved in the 2011 hazing death of Robert Champion.
lead_paragraph: The Orange County Sheriff’s Office said charges would be brought against members of the school band involved in the death of Robert Champion.

headline.seo: Florida A&M Hazing Death Charges Planned
headline.main: Charges Are Planned in Florida A&M Hazing Death
headline.print_headline: Charges Are Planned in Florida A&M Hazing Death
